entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
